extension.description: A ListItem Helper service which provides values from OMDB/TMDB while using script.module.metadatautils[CR][CR]Property names:[CR](home) axbmcuserData.ListItem.rating.rottentomatoes.percent[CR](home) axbmcuserData.ListItem.rating.rottentomatoes.image[CR](home) axbmcuserData.ListItem.rating.metacritic.percent[CR](home) axbmcuserData.ListItem.rating.imdb.percent[CR](home) axbmcuserData.ListItem.rating.imdb[CR](home) axbmcuserData.ListItem.rating.imdb.votes[CR](home) axbmcuserData.ListItem.rating.awards[CR](home) axbmcuserData.ListItem.budget[CR](home) axbmcuserData.ListItem.budget.million[CR](home) axbmcuserData.ListItem.budget.formatted[CR](home) axbmcuserData.ListItem.revenue[CR](home) axbmcuserData.ListItem.revenue.million[CR](home) axbmcuserData.ListItem.revenue.formatted[CR](home) axbmcuserData.ListItem.revenue.boxoffice[CR](home) axbmcuserData.ListItem.IMDBNumber[CR][CR]For use with other containers like home screen widgets set the following properties:[CR][CR](home) ListItemHelper.WidgetContainerId[CR]to the container ID (Example: 8000)[CR](home) ListItemHelper.WidgetContainerWindowName[CR]to the window name where the container resides (Example: home)[CR][CR]Important remarks:[CR]- Unset the WidgetContainer-properties when leaving focus from the widget.[CR]- This addon may require a beta-version of script.module.metadatautils from the developers (marcelveldt) beta repo because the version from the official KODI repo may be old and broken.[CR]- Most likely you will have to input your own OMDB API key within the script.module.metadatautils settings.
